name: Pushup Bot
description: Slack Bot that says when it's time to do pushups

START_TIME.description: The time of day that the first pushups shall be done, including time zone.

PERIOD_MINUTES.description: The length of the period between pushups, in minutes.

END_TIME.description: No notices will be posted at or after this time.

ACTIVE_WEEKDAYS.description: List of weekdays that notices will be sent. All weekdays are 'UMTWRFS'.

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: Real-time messaging API Token. Create a new bot here: https://slack.com/apps/new/A0F7YS25R-bots

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Currently Pushup Bot is very narrow-minded and will only post to one channel. You must create this channel and invite the bot to it.
